sn48.66:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam indriyanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta satta phala sattanisamsa patikankha.
sn48.66:1.8: no ce dittheva dhamme patikacca annam aradheti, atha maranakale annam aradheti.
sn48.66:1.9: No ce dittheva dhamme annam aradheti, no ce maranakale annam aradheti, atha pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya antaraparinibbayi hoti,
sn48.66:1.14: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam indriyanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta ime satta phala sattanisamsa patikankha”ti.
